member.name: T:Bam.Net.ServiceProxy.RequestHeaderApplicationNameResolver
member.summary: IApplicationNameResolver implementation that reads the application name from the X-Bam-AppName header if it exists

member.name: T:Bam.Net.ServiceProxy.DefaultUserResolver
member.summary: Resolves the current user of the application by first trying the default web user then, if nothing is returned returns the owner of the current process.

member.name: M:Bam.Net.ServiceProxy.DefaultWebUserResolver.GetCurrentUser
member.summary: Gets the current web user as reported by HttpContext.Current.User.Identity

member.name: T:Bam.Net.ServiceProxy.MethodGenerationInfo
member.summary: Provides meta data to code generators about a particular method

member.name: P:Bam.Net.ServiceProxy.ServiceResponse.Data
member.summary: Relevant data returned in response to a request

member.name: T:Bam.Net.ServiceProxy.Secure.ApiKeyRequiredAttribute
member.summary: Attribute used to addorn classes or methods that require authentication or authorization. Implicity requires application level encryption

member.name: T:Bam.Net.ServiceProxy.Secure.ApiKeyInfo
member.summary: A Serializable representation of an applications credentials.

member.name: P:Bam.Net.ServiceProxy.Secure.ApiKeyInfo.ApiKey
member.summary: The shared secret; keep this value private

member.name: T:Bam.Net.ServiceProxy.Secure.ApiKeyProvider
member.summary: A class used to retrieve an applications Api Key and client Id to be used in SecureServiceProxy sessions. Implementers of this class need only implement the GetApplicationClientId and GetApplicationApiKey methods, retrieving each from an appropriate location. For example, the DefaultConfigurationApiKeyProvider retrieves this information from the web.config or app.config file.

member.name: M:Bam.Net.ServiceProxy.Secure.IApiKeyResolver.CreateKeyToken(System.String)
member.summary: When implemented by a derived class hashes the specified stringToHash using the key/shared secret

member.name: T:Bam.Net.ServiceProxy.Secure.LocalApiKeyManager
member.summary: Class used to manage Api Keys.

member.name: P:Bam.Net.ServiceProxy.Secure.LocalApiKeyManager.UserResolver
member.summary: The component used to resolve the current user or the user of a specified IHttpContext based on the session cookie therein

member.name: T:Bam.Net.ServiceProxy.Secure.ApiKeyResolver
member.summary: A class used to provide the functionality of both an ApiKeyProvider and an ApplicationNameProvider

member.name: M:Bam.Net.ServiceProxy.Secure.ApiKey.GetUniqueFilter
member.summary: Gets a query filter that should uniquely identify the current instance. The default implementation compares the Id/key field to the current instance's.
